name: master-thesis-onboarding
description: Master thesis of onboarding with mobile applications

scripts.spellcheck: for f in chapters/*.tex ; do echo $f ; aspell --lang=en --mode=tex --extra-dicts=./project.dic list < $f | sort | uniq -c ; done
scripts.dumpwords: for f in chapters/*.tex ; do echo $f ; aspell --lang=en --mode=tex --extra-dicts=./project.dic list < $f | sort | uniq >> project.dic ; done

author: Simon L. Johansson @simonlovesyou
